duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and model circuit and sub-system architecture, and perform verification.
Integrate and test at component, CCA, and subsystem levels.
Transition to production and provide technical support to manufacturing and test engineers.
Occasional travel to supplier, integration, and customer sites may be required.
Manage small projects or processes within area of responsibility.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics (STEM) and a minimum of 5 years of prior relevant experience OR an Advanced Degree in a related field and minimum 3 years of experience. Relevant experience combined in one or more of the following areas: Digital design and/or test, Hands-on experience with design simulation tools, The ability to obtain and maintain a US security clearance.
